career.role: Researching AI technologies and implementing into company products
career.description: I am researching and implementing various AI technologies to enhance the company's products and services. This includes working with large language models (LLMs), vector databases, speech-to-text (STT) systems, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) models, and fine-tuning techniques to optimize model performance for specific use cases.

career.skills: LLM, Langchain, RAG, NLP-to-SQL, Milvus, ApacheAtlas
career.description: Had LLM chain model development for NongHyup. Built RAG model using Langchain and Milvus. Also developed a model that can generate SQL queries and check table information in the database through an automated LLM model using natural language.

company.name: Gangwon National University
company.location: Seoul National University Hospital, Hyehwa, Seoul

career.description: Planned a model to determine the presence of dementia. Identified algorithms from existing research and designed the model, proposing a detection model architecture. Designed a multimodal model utilizing audio, video, and script features.

career.skills: React, React-query, Docker, Nextjs, Typescript, Python, Linux
career.description: In charge of UI development using Nextjs for front-end and back-end development, and deploying services using Docker containers.

In charge of sales in Moscow. Developed business with existing partners in Russia and CIS countries, and acted as a bridge between the headquarters and local partners to establish partnerships with Russian state-owned energy companies.

In charge of sales in Eastern Europe. Developed business by directly visiting local partners in each country, discovering dealers, and expanding the business. Secured various new partners in countries such as Moldova, Georgia, Armenia, and Albania, contributing to increased sales.
